title: Episode 29: Deb Perelman & Michael Harlan Turkell
description: This week on Let’s Eat In Cathy hosted blogger Deb Perelman & food photographer Michael Harlan Turkell. Deb discussed how she is turning her blog The Smitten Kitchen into an upcoming cook book.
author: info@heritageradionetwork.org (Heritage Radio Network)
content:encoded: This week on Let’s Eat In Cathy hosted blogger Deb Perelman & food photographer Michael Harlan Turkell. Deb discussed how she is turning her blog The Smitten Kitchen into an upcoming cook book.
